attributes.action: Stop Gordon Brown becoming the automatic successor to Tony Blair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should not be allowed to become the automatic successor to Tony Blair. Gordon Brown does not have the qualities to lead either the Labour Party or indeed the country. He is full of self-satisfaction and complacency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
